title: Intelligent Scheduling & Patient Access
summary: Heuristic scheduling engine with omnichannel patient engagement (WhatsApp, web portal, mobile app) designed to maximize provider utilization and reduce no-shows.
description:
Heuristic scheduling engine with omnichannel patient engagement (WhatsApp, web portal, mobile app) designed to maximize provider utilization and reduce no-shows.

## Technical Architecture Components

- Heuristic scheduling algorithm engine
- WhatsApp Business API integration
- Twilio/SMS gateway service
- Real-time sync engine (WebSocket/SSE)
- Calendar integration service (Google/Microsoft)

## Implementation Timeline

**Day 1:**
- Provider schedule configuration

**Day 2:**
- Patient contact list import

**Day 3:**
- Portal and WhatsApp activation

**Week 2:**
- Reminder cadence optimization

## Case Study Reference

**Dermatology Center, Austin**

- **Outcome:** Reduced no-show rate from 18% to 4% in 60 days, added 12 billable hours/week
